languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я не нарочно, оно само! Никогда меня еще так мраком не крыло. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".
"Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я не нарочно, оно само! Никогда меня еще так мраком не крыло. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."
"Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."
"Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."
"Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

languages.text: “我不是故意的，舰长大人，它就那么来了！我以前从来没身处过这样的黑暗，真的没有。我看到了一片黑暗，除了黑暗什么都没有。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: “我不是故意的，舰长大人，它就那么来了！我以前从来没身处过这样的黑暗，真的没有。我看到了一片黑暗，除了黑暗什么都没有。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas fait exprès, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est venu tout seul ! Jamais encore je ne m'étais retrouvée dans de telles ténèbres. Non pas que je sois aveugle, non. Je peux voir les ténèbres. Et rien d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas fait exprès, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, c'est venu tout seul ! Jamais encore je ne m'étais retrouvée dans de telles ténèbres. Non pas que je sois aveugle, non. Je peux voir les ténèbres. Et rien d'autre. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no ha sido adrede. ¡Ha pasado sin más! Nunca he visto una oscuridad tan total. No estoy ciega, no. Veo la oscuridad. Es lo único que veo».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no ha sido adrede. ¡Ha pasado sin más! Nunca he visto una oscuridad tan total. No estoy ciega, no. Veo la oscuridad. Es lo único que veo».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、わざとじゃない、偶然こうなっただけ！こんな暗闇を見るのは初めて。い上、盲目になったわけではない。私には暗闇が、そう、闇だけが見える」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、わざとじゃない、偶然こうなっただけ！こんな暗闇を見るのは初めて。い上、盲目になったわけではない。私には暗闇が、そう、闇だけが見える」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es war keine Absicht, es ist einfach geschehen! Ich war noch nie in so völliger Dunkelheit. Ich bin nicht erblindet, nein. Ich kann die Dunkelheit sehen. Und nur die Dunkelheit."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es war keine Absicht, es ist einfach geschehen! Ich war noch nie in so völliger Dunkelheit. Ich bin nicht erblindet, nein. Ich kann die Dunkelheit sehen. Und nur die Dunkelheit."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bilerek yapmadım. Birden oluverdi! Daha önce hiç böyle bir karanlığa gömülmemiştim. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I didn't do it on purpose, it just happened! I've never been in such complete darkness before. I've not gone blind, no. I can see the darkness. And only the darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, bilerek yapmadım. Birden oluverdi! Daha önce hiç böyle bir karanlığa gömülmemiştim. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
